reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Tutorial and educational for students Rohingyas (Phase II)

description.narrative: - Create an educational environment for the three external centers - Classes in Arabic language, computer skills, mathematics sciences, educational process enhancement, and mental health. - Providing school uniforms for male and female students. Providing school bag and stationery. Providing school meals

Providing educational and educational services for the Rohingya minority in Malaysia by teaching Arabic language, computer skills, mathematics and computer sciences in addition to enhancing the educational process and mental health of Rohingya students. - Create an educational environment for 3 external centers and provide the appropriate place for the educational process.

Teaching and teaching 700 male and female students from the Rohingya minority. Providing school uniforms, school bags, stationery and school meals for 700 students. Providing job opportunities for 23 teachers and 3 supervisors. Carrying out the necessary maintenance work and providing the necessary needs that contribute to improving the educational climate for (3) educational centers

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
